title: Tape Ninja Waterproof Gaffer Tape, White
features: PROFESSIONAL WHITE GAFFER TAPE - Not familiar with Tape Ninja Gaffer Tape? It's a full 30 yard roll of matte finish cloth tape with a high tensile strength, and with a third of the adhesive of duct tape. Why should you care? Because it's wicked strong, flexible, tears easily, its waterproof and it LEAVES NO RESIDUE.

IT’S MULTIPURPOSE – Tape Ninja Gaffer Tape is just as handy around the house as it is on stage or set. You can use it for anything that you would generally use Duct Tape for, but with the benefit of it not leaving sticky residue, peeling paint or catching on fire. In essence, it'll hold anything and stick to anything you want, but when it's time to strike the set, re-set markers or take that fake art off the wall, you can pull Tape Ninja Gaffer Tape up/off without worrying about residue.

MATTE FINISH, TEARS EASILY, WATERPROOF – Tape Ninja Gaffer Tape has a non-reflective, Matte Finish which means that it won’t reflect light like other tapes. It’s also waterproof. So apart from full immersion scenarios, Tape Ninja Gaffer Tape will keep your cable connections, seams, and camera accessories safe in almost any weather.

WE USE OUR PRODUCT ALL THE TIME! - We know our tapes and our customers because we use Tape Ninja Gaffer Tape too! We are filmmakers, performers, audio professionals, event managers etc. MADE IN THE USA - Our tape is made 100% in the USA and it always will be. We work directly with a family owned tape manufacturer that’s been in business for over 40 years.

BACKED BY A NO-QUESTIONS-ASKED, 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE, Tape Ninja will replace your product in the unlikely event of a complication. We want you to be able to pull your tape out of the box and take care of business. We create premium products and back them up with our premium warranty. ORDER YOURS TODAY, RISK FREE!
description: PRO QUALITY WHITE GAFFER TAPE - MADE IN THE USA

➤ Is rugged and durable ➤ Secures cables and wires to most surfaces ➤ Removes easily ➤ Leaves no residue or gunk ➤ Tears easily into strips by hand ➤ Matte finish doesn’t reflect light ➤ Safe to adhere to almost anything ➤ Flexible & Strong
We provide pro quality Gaffer Tape to professionals of all industries:
➤ Theatrical productions ➤ Touring productions ➤ Film Sets ➤ AV Professionals ➤ Musicians ➤ and many more!
➤ Total thickness: 11.5 mils ➤ Adhesion to Steel: 50 oz/in ➤ *Tensile Strength: 42 lb/in
